== Value ==

There are 2 variations of this entity:

  * `&HARDcy;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/042a/index.htm U+0042A].
  * `&hardcy;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/044a/index.htm U+0044A].
